meanings.definition: Not subject to depletion or exhaustion
meanings.sent1: The nonexpendable battery lasted for years without needing a replacement.
meanings.sent2: The nonexpendable resources of the earth must be preserved for future generations.
meanings.sent3: The nonexpendable energy of the sun kept the solar panels running even on cloudy days.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like a nonexpendable well, never running dry even in challenging times.
meanings.sent5: The nonexpendable love between the siblings was evident in their unwavering support for each other.

meanings.definition: Not able to be used up or consumed
meanings.sent1: The nonexpendable ink in the pen allowed him to write countless pages.
meanings.sent2: Water is a nonexpendable necessity for all living beings.
meanings.sent3: The nonexpendable chocolate supply in the pantry mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was like a nonexpendable treasure trove, always offering valuable insights.
meanings.sent5: The nonexpendable joy in her heart radiated through her contagious laughter.
